text: Gary Waldhorn (3 July 1943 â€“ 10 January 2022) was an English actor and comedian. He was known for his roles in British television and theatre. He appeared as Richard Beamish in All at No 20, Lionel Bainbridge in Brush Strokes and Councillor David Horton in The Vicar of Dibley. Waldhorn died on 10 January 2022, at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London Category:People from Paddington Category:Comedians from London
title: Gary Waldhorn
